summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to defense attorney Gerald Lefcourt, transmitting a revised version of a non-prosecution agreement for Jeffrey Epstein as per the request of Mr. Acosta. The email confirms the operative terms remain unchanged.

persons.name: Gerald Lefcourt
persons.context: Recipient of the email containing the revised non-prosecution agreement for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Mr. Acosta
persons.context: The individual who requested the revised version of the Epstein non-prosecution agreement.

connections.description: Lefcourt, as defense attorney for Epstein, is corresponding with Acosta, a U.S. Attorney, regarding the non-prosecution agreement.

events.title: Transmission of Revised Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails a revised version of a non-prosecution agreement for Jeffrey Epstein to defense attorney Gerald Lefcourt.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: A revised non-prosecution agreement for Jeffrey Epstein was transmitted via email on September 11, 2007.
The revision was made at the request of Mr. Acosta, a U.S. Attorney.
The email states the 'operative terms have not changed' in the revised agreement.
The correspondence originated from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the West Palm Beach, FL office.
